Commentary.ab: Y10.4b yaϑra] cod. 410. Geldner yaϑa; Kellens yaϑa, but Kellens, 2007, p. 73 consideres the correction mandatory; Pirart, 2004 p. 92, n. 221 yaϑra, Skt. translation yasmin sthāne.
Y10.4c-d] sec. Geldner; Kellens, Pirart in Y10.5.

Y10.4c mazā̊] against cod., except 83, Mf1 post corr. (non vidimus), Pirart; cod., Geldner, Kellens mazdā̊, but Kellens, 2007, p.74 mazā̊ "est retenue pour la traduction". PT ohrmazd meh (!), ST evam mahattarodayam (for mazā̊ huruθma). Vid. Pirart, 2004 pp. 29-30.
Y10.4d višpaϑa] Geldner, Kellens, Pirart; hardly attested in mss. (100, 4020, 4030, 4161, 4162), but viš.paϑa. Cf. Y10.11 viš.paϑa, name of a mountain.
Y10.4d haiϑīmca] Pirart haiϑīm[ca], based on PT and Skt (-ca absent in the translations).

Parallels.ab: ząm pərəϑβīm paϑanąm ... bərəϑrīm ~ Yt13.9 ząm pərəϑβīm ahuraδātąm yąm masīmca paϑanąmca yā barəϑri.
